entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ILLink: Trim analyzer doesn't warn on dataflow through multidimensional array #101951
  • Disposing TarEntry.DataStream causes TarReader.GetNextEntry to throw ObjectDisposedException #101948
  • Update .NET 9 Arm32 for Y2038 #101944
  • [NativeAOT] Enable CET support #101942
  • [Performance] Regression on Fortunes - Windows #101936
  • Arm64/Sve: Mirror some of the morph optimizations from AVX512 #101933
  • [NativeAOT] Consider encoding epilogs/prologs in GC or Debug info. #101932
  • setting start up project for `dotnet run` when using CLI. #101931
  • Firefox-MT: MONO_WASM: Unhandled error: RuntimeError: index out of bounds #101930
    9.0.0
  • Firefox-MT: [MONO] * Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/metadata/object.c:2029, condition `klass' not met #101929
    9.0.0
  • Documentation example for `Process` is incorrect/misleading. #101928
  • [API Proposal]: Add Claim.HasProperties to avoid allocating Properties Dictionary #101922
  • Infinite loop in Frame::UpdateFloatingPointRegisters on ARM64 #101921
  • JIT won't CSE Math.Min with integers #101920
    Future
  • [Long running test] System.Net.Tests.WebHeaderCollectionTest.HttpResponseHeader_AddInvalid_Throws #101919
  • Show a prompt to users when opening a .NET exe on Windows asking if they want to install .NET automatically if they don't have .NET installed #101918
  • [browser] JSMarshalAs(JSType.Function) support for Task #101913
    9.0.0
  • [browser] HybridGlobalization correct HashCode ranges of skipped unicodes #101912
    9.0.0
  • Do ComWrappers support proxies well? #101909
  • Moving to dotnet 8 causes a memory leak #101907
  • Moving to dotnet 8 causes a sudden increase in the LOH size. #101906
  • Native SGen crash after updating from 8004 to 8053 #101905
  • AsQueryable trimmed happy path doesn't work with AOT #101903
    Future
  • Test failure GC\\API\\GCHandle\\AddrOfPinnedObject_neg\\AddrOfPinnedObject_neg.cmd #101901
    9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT/linux-arm64] AF: codeManager->IsUnwindable(pvAddress) || runtime->IsConservativeStackReportingEnabled() #101896

Closed

  • ILLink: Trim analyzer doesn't require type strings to be assembly qualified when passed to annotated parameters #101952
  • Test failure Interop/COM/NETClients/IDispatch/NETClientIDispatch/NETClientIDispatch.cmd #101898
    9.0.0
  • superpmi tool crashing with "Heap contamination detected!" #101708
    9.0.0
  • GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute can cause CS0108 error with two derived COM interfaces declaring methods with same name and signature #101240
    Future
  • [mono] Mono doesn't respect explicit size for structures when marked with LayoutKind.Sequential #101432
  • [API Proposal]: Add `CollectionsMarshal.AsMemory(List<T>)` #101914
  • dotnet restore fails when building repo #101720
  • AccessViolationException on macOS in Asn1Tag.TryDecode #101479
    9.0.0
  • [linux] Segfault while invoking Roslyn's csc.dll with long command line #98936
    9.0.0
  • [mono][tests] System.Runtime.Caching assert fails on linux-bionic #93106
  • [mono][aot] Enable direct call transformation for wrappers #83378
    9.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Enable direct call transformation for inflated methods #83379
    9.0.0
  • [tvos][test] mlaunch exited with 0, when test passed #95862
    9.0.0
  • Proposal: Convenience API for throwing exceptions #20604
    Future
  • [mono][maccatalyst] Failures in System.IO.IsolatedStorage.Tests #101371
    9.0.0
  • High memory usages on "AMD EPYC 7R13 Processor" #99804
    9.0.0
  • Test failure ilverify\\ILVerificationTests.cmd #101900
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_92201/Runtime_92201/Runtime_92201.cmd #101897
  • 'ConvertOrWidenPrimitivesEnumsAndPointersIfPossible' in NativeAOT is unnecessarily rooting 'BigInteger' (and a bunch more stuff) due to 'Convert.*' calls #101821

PullRequests

Created

  • Utilize new APIs in the WebSocket implementation #101953
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 1 #101950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ILLink: Add EdgeVisitor and ITracingNode to trace edges in the graph #101949
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Use alternative mechanisms to allow us to use the default new/delete implementations #101947
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Switch from arm64 biarch image to Azure Linux image #101946
    needs-area-label
  • [Test Only] WinHttp CI Test 2 #101940
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [Test Only] WinHttp CI Test 1 #101939
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Visit switch successors in increasing likelihood order for RPO-based layout #101935
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Remove unused --arch and --gc switches from driver.c #101934
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use REG_INDIRECT_CALL_TARGET_REG for indirect calls on arm64 #101927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: fix STRESS_BB_PROFILE issue #101925
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle missing HTTP3 error cases #101923
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • [Release/8.0] Fix handling exceptions on shutdown #101915
    Servicing-consider, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Finish the TypeName cleanup #101910
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 9.0.0
  • Remove O1K_VALUE_NUMBER #101894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [JIT] SVE Cleanup: Merging SVE_AE_3A, SVE_AN_3A, SVE_EP_3A, SVE_ER_3A, SVE_ET_3A, SVE_EU_3A into SVE_AA_3A #101785
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Missing `AddRef()` in test for `IDispatch` #101943
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: Some optimizations around loop scenario #101885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • Enable streaming by default for EventPipe sessions started by environment variable #101867
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Linker dependency framework #101277
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Simplify our global new/delete implementations #101826
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable derived COM interfaces to hide base methods with the new keyword #101577
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: Test RPO-based layout in `libraries-pgo` #101924
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64/SVE: Mark operation inside ConditionalSelect as delay-free #101870
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • [cdac] Update cdac-build-tool to omit type when it is empty #101825
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Use IndexOf for bounded loops in a regex code gen #101899
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 9.0.0
  • Delete dead code in GetLogicalProcessorCacheSizeFromOS for Linux Arm64 #100570
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Refactor some DateTime and TimeSpan formatting/parsing methods #101640
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add FreeBSD-specific logic to pal::get_default_installation_dir_for_arch #100731
    os-freebsd, area-Host, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] fix rm field in riscvd instruction #101908
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Update auto-generated native AOT metadata wrappers to use readonly structs #101895
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Add SwiftError support for Swift reverse pinvokes #101122
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Fix nonvolatile context restoration referenced 101709. #101904
    area-PAL-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • s390x: Fix nonvolatile context restoration #101854
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] don't clear float-regs when passed by integer-regs. #101902
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Typename parsing cleanup #101767
    area-System.Reflection
  • Start running System.Runtime trimming tests #101592
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Properly disable S.L.Queryable trimming tests with AOT #101417
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Start running S.L.Expressions trimming tests #101593
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimize 'ConvertOrWidenPrimitivesEnumsAndPointersIfPossible' #101858
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • [Experiment] Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono] generic wrapper methods for unsafe accessors #101732
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride validation error #101246
    area-System.Reflection
  • Enable AVX512 embedded masking for most other intrinsics #101886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use QueueUserAPC2 for EE suspension on CoreCLR win-arm64. #101891
    arch-arm64, os-windows, area-VM-coreclr
  • Provide MSBuild properties to use the new libc++ configuration we plan on using in our builds #101773
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Merge JIT/Methodical tests into the merged runners #101317
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use classes rather than records for parts of the incremental pipeline in interop generators and hide constructors #101740
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Remove Thread::m_pDomain - always the one app domain #101749
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Improve performance of Debugger.NotifyOfCrossThreadDependency under a debugger #101864
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Allow moving handler regions in fgRelocateEHRegions #101613
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move issue links from comments to the warning attributes in trimming tests. #101819
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Revise compiler hardening options on Unix #98622
    area-VM-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [wasm] Add custom mmap/munmap implementation for anonymous mappings #101871
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [browser] Integrate static web asset endpoints into wasm sdk #101315
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] Implement TODO in mono-threads-wasi.S #101337
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Transition to 1ES templates work (Backport crossgen2 changes) #101869
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • unblock Unix Domain Socket on Dispose on macOS #101753
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Commit Accounting related changes #100380
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Porting `SuspendAllThreads` from the NativeAOT to CoreCLR. #101782
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Provide System.IO.Pipelines package readme #99666
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Fix cancellation unregistration in DataflowBlock.OutputAvailableAsync #99632
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Threading.Tasks, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Separate hybrid globalization JS code to es6 module #101543
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • [WinHttpHandler] Move `_cachedSendPinnedBuffer` ownership to `WinHttpRequestState` #101725
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • WIP: another workaround for hardcoded compiler versions #100828
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [mono][wasm] Refactor mono_fixup_symbol_name #101681
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • JIT CSE Optimization - Add a gymnasium environment for reinforcement learning #101856
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix context restoration as #101709 describes #101865
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Integrate naot-llvm into workload manifest #101801
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • basic support for TCP fast open #99490
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Delete `BBF_FAILED_VERIFICATION` and `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #93483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [RISC-V] Add quirks for riscv to R2RDump #101683
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] Transition to 1ES templates work (Backport #92901) #101703
    area-Infrastructure
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `CS1591` fires for protected members on sealed types #73348
  • Type arguments are not being inferred correctly from method group #73347
  • Overload resolution ambiguity introduced by SDK 8.0.300-preview.24203.14 #73346

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove VersionStamp serialization #73359
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Simplify progress scope code #73358
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Run final fix-all code-cleanup phase out of process. #73357
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make fix-all code action more parallel #73356
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Test #73354
    Area-Interactive, untriaged

Merged

  • Turn on NRT for AbstractLanguageService #73355
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Defer instantiating debugger related feature components until needed #73349
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move to instantiating and setting up the language service on a bg thread #73351
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue producing metadata references in VS #73345
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unused type #73352
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Razor fallback changes #73001
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update 17.11 configs after VS snap #73350
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add additional extension type tests #73334
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve analyzer consistency check message #73329
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Fix sorting of extensions from more specific to less #73276
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Switch Roslyn protocol types to System.Text.Json serialization #73207
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve C# grammar generator. #73340
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update msbuild version to 17.3.4 #73283
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Improve parser recovery around nullable types in patterns #72805
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Statically bind invocations in presence of dynamic arguments only for local functions #73314
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.11
  • Add public API for ref like type parameters #73335
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Fix Double-to-Long overflow check #73016
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.11
  • WIP: Sync solution contents consistently #72860
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Support organizing imports as part of LSP document formatting #70538
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Continue visiting bad named argument if not target-typed in NullableWalker #73326
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Static files not found when deploying Razor Pages app to Linux #55563
  • Perf regression: fortunes_spring #55562
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, single_query, updates #55561
  • Blazor static SSR additional FormMapping options: TrimFormValues & TreatEmptyStringAsNull #55560
  • HttpGet MVC breaks Blazor server websockets #55559
  • .NET 8 dotnet-user-jwts does not support JSON files with comments in them #55557
  • OpenApiReference default className breaks NSwag generated code when using MultipleClients #55556
    Backlog
  • Publication of Blazor Apps with 'Individual Accounts' break the publication process #55554
  • (SignalR): Support custom output formatter #55546
  • Different behavior of FromKeyedServices attribute in Minimal APIs handler vs class library #55545
    Discussions
  • Perf regression: caching, fortunes_spring #55544

Closed

  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ProblemDetails no longer serializes to JSON in RFC 7807 compliant casing in .NET 8 #53639
  • Error "InvalidOperationException: Sequence contains more than one matching element" in Swagger when using multiple [FromForm] parameters in Minimal API #53831
    9.0-preview5
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #55510
  • AddQuickGridEntityFrameworkAdapter is missing from API docs #55136
    9.0-preview4
  • 8.0 BlazorWebAppOidc Roles claim not being respected on [Authorize(Roles="asdfdsf")] Attributte #55314
  • Blazor SSR client validation on browser before EditForm submitting #55541
  • After deleting a class member from the. net core and hot reloading, it is still possible to obtain this class member through reflection #55486
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct, ApiCrudUpdateProduct #55540
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #55523
  • Perf regression: single_query #55530
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #55539
  • Perf regression: mvc #55533
  • create a table #55542
  • table #55543
  • Virtualize and displaying content at the end of the list #54742
  • Browser encryption issue Platform not supported on the latest version of dotnet #55382

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Adds static asset endpoints, serve compressed assets #55558
    area-blazor
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.5.24253.17 #55549
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Fix typo in IUserClaimStore.cs #55547
    area-identity, community-contribution

Merged

  • Bump System.Security.Cryptography.Xml version to address CVE-2023-29331 #55304
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview5

Updated

  • Set the baggage even when the trace id is not successfully extracted #55341
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Add separate activities for Hub methods #55439
    area-signalr
  • Use DisposeAsync in FileStreamResultExecutor #55524
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Adding accept header to callsites within SignalR #55271
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5
  • UnixCertificateManager: implement IsTrusted. #55335
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

PullRequests

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • exception of type 'javax.crypto.aeadbadtag exception' was thrown when calling SecureStorage.Default.SetAsync on Android #22239
  • SkiaImage.Resize returns unsafe IImage instance #22236
  • MAUI.iOS /usr/bin/codesign exited with code 2: invalid option #22235
  • Navigation title for split flyout detail page overrides the flyout title #22233
  • FileSystem.Current.AppDataDirectory returns an invalid path when built for Windows as unpackaged #22231
  • Crash App when change ControlTemplate and click item in Android App MAUI #22229
  • Certain VPNs cause MAUI to respond with connectivity of NetworkAccess.Local #22228
  • Using WebSockets Exception thrown: 'System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketException' in System.Private.CoreLib.dll #22221
  • Allow custom font to be read and set during runtime #22220
    Backlog
  • FontImageSource character does not display properly on specific fonts #22217
  • [MAUI] After refreshing, C2 and C3 pages will leave part of the content empty. #22215

Closed

  • [Spec] Deconstruct DualScreen Nuget into Essentials and Maui.Core (Investigating) #1164
    Backlog
  • Upgrade WindowsAppSDK dependency version #14107
    Backlog
  • [regression/8.0.3] Microsoft.Maui.Storage.FileSystem.Current.AppDataDirectory + CacheDataDirectory Broken - Windows 10 #18880
    Backlog
  • MAUI and OpenXR #22223
  • Not able select Listview items some times in MAUI for Windows #19422
  • Unable to build chain to self-signed root for signer .NET MAUI 7.0 #18693
  • [MAUI]Text appears overlapping on RefreshView page. #15993
  • [TotalAV] Debug build works for android maui8 but release doesnt compile because file is being used by another process #21836
  • Calling UseMauiMaps() in the MAUI startup pipeline in a multi-platform targeted App throws an exception #22214

PullRequests

Created

  • Add .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid + Web App solution template #22234
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Windows] Avoid Carousel changes the current position when window is resized #22222
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #22218
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview4] Update versions for release of 9.0.0 p4 #22227
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #22219
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #22226
  • Revert "[net8.0] Merge main to net8.0" #22225

Updated

  • [ci] Move to arcade , remove GitInfo and Mono dependencies #21487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Enforce CA1854 performance analyzer #22100
    community ✨
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak in modal pages #22089
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leaks in `*Cell` #22067
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [iOS] Apply contentInsets for any entry/editor in a scrollview #21807
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, layout-scrollview
  • Make ImageSource more async-friendly #22098
    area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-image
  • [Android] Geolocation IsListeningForeground property is always false #21919
    platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Better ARM support device tests/CI pipeline in general #18568
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing
  • [UI Test] Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #21897
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, area/keyboard
  • [Windows] Fix pointer released event not being handled on ImageButton #21766
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Added a support for GradientBrushes on Shape.Stroke #22208
    t/enhancement ☀️, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • [Android] CarouselView: VirtualView cannot be null here, when clearing and adding items on second navigation - fix #22207
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • [iOS] Button CharacterSpacing Fix #20537
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-button
  • Fixed On Platform="Default" not working #22148
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • fix: fix 22183 RadioButton checked value #22186
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-radiobutton
  • [iOS] Span's TapGestureRecognizer not working if text is truncated #22213
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/gestures
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix text toolbar item icon not removed when navigating on Android #16796
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/toolbar, Under Consideration

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Boolean property with default '1' not working #33683
  • Neater error message when context type is not explicitly specified. #33680

Closed

  • When to trigger IMaterializationInterceptor if materialization is not from a query? #33614

PullRequests

Updated

  • OTEL implementation, so far matching EventCounters infrastructure. #33633

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-06
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Onboard scenario-tests repo into the VMR #17165

PullRequests

Created

  • Specify artifacts path #19690
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #19689
  • Cherry-pick: Create 0001-Disable-APICompat-for-DotNetBuild.patch (#19612) #19687
  • Handle spaces in properties passed to VMR's build.sh #19686
  • Add false positive wpf licenses to exclusions #19685
  • Allow diagnostics test binaries #19682
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #19675

Merged

  • Rebootstrap SDK to unblock testing issue #19684
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #19688
  • Migrate security-partners-dotnet pipeline to 1ES #19621
  • Disable VMR runtests outside of PRs to unblock re-boostrap #19683
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #19676
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #19583
    Branch Lockdown

Updated

  • Restructure test assets and baselines #19650
  • Fix comparison for scenario tests condition #19670
  • Clean up contents from previously-sb tarball post binary-cleanup #19632
